About Us

Established in 2008, we have constantly been striving to improve our service to our members. Your goals, become our goals. We offer flexible memborship packages tailored to your needs. We aim to satisfy customers from all areas of fitness, from elite athletes to the average person trying to lose a few pounds. That's why we offer a range of flexible memborship and training packages to suit your needs.

Members must be 18 years of age, or over.
The site is monitored by CCTV surveillance.
Our Car Park is for members/visitors only
